TestCase.name: testAggCallNotSupported
TestCase.Resource: SELECT mf0, f1 FROM (SELECT max(f0) as mf0 FROM t1) t2, LATERAL ( SELECT f1, f2 FROM t1 WHERE f0 = t2.mf0 ORDER BY f2 DESC LIMIT 3 )

LogicalProject(mf0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], mf0=[MAX($0)]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $cor0.mf0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

LogicalProject(mf0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], mf0=[MAX($0)]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $cor0.mf0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

TestCase.name: testAggInputNonMappingNotSupported
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, f1 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT f0 FROM (SELECT f0 + f1 as f0 from t1)) t2, LATERAL ( SELECT f1, f2 FROM t1 WHERE f0 = t2.f0 ORDER BY f2 DESC LIMIT 3 )

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[+($0, $1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(CAST($0):BIGINT, $cor0.f0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[+($0, $1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(CAST($0):BIGINT, $cor0.f0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

TestCase.name: testCorrelateSortToRank
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, f1 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT f0 FROM t1) t2, LATERAL ( SELECT f1, f2 FROM t1 WHERE f0 = t2.f0 ORDER BY f2 DESC LIMIT 3 )

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $cor0.f0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalRank(rankType=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=3], partitionBy=[$0], orderBy=[$2 DESC], select=[f0=$0, f1=$1, f2=$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

TestCase.name: testNonInnerJoinNotSupported
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, f1 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT f0 FROM t1) t2 NATURAL LEFT JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT f1, f2 FROM t1 WHERE f0 = t2.f0 ORDER BY f2 DESC LIMIT 3 )

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[left], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $cor0.f0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[left], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $cor0.f0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

TestCase.name: testFilterConditionNotCorrelationID
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, f1 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT f0 FROM t1) t2, LATERAL ( SELECT f1, f2 FROM t1 WHERE t2.f0 = f0 + 1 ORDER BY f2 DESC LIMIT 3 )

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.f0, +($0, 1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.f0, +($0, 1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

TestCase.name: testCorrelateSortToRankWithMultipleGroupKeys
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, f2 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT f0, f1 FROM t1) t2, LATERAL ( SELECT f2 FROM t1 WHERE f0 = t2.f0 AND f1 = t2.f1 ORDER BY f2 DESC LIMIT 3 )

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 1}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $cor0.f0), =($1, $cor0.f1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalRank(rankType=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=3], partitionBy=[$0,$1], orderBy=[$2 DESC], select=[f0=$0, f1=$1, f2=$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

TestCase.name: testSortWithOffsetNotSupported
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, f1 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT f0 FROM t1) t2, LATERAL ( SELECT f1, f2 FROM t1 WHERE f0 = t2.f0 ORDER BY f2 DESC OFFSET 2 ROWS FETCH NEXT 3 ROWS ONLY )

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], offset=[2], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $cor0.f0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], offset=[2], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $cor0.f0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

TestCase.name: testNonEqualConditionNotSupported
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, f1 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT f0 FROM t1) t2, LATERAL ( SELECT f1, f2 FROM t1 WHERE f0 > t2.f0 ORDER BY f2 DESC LIMIT 3 )

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, $cor0.f0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, $cor0.f0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

TestCase.name: testMultipleGroupingsWithConstantNotSupported1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, f2 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT f0, f1 FROM t1) t2, LATERAL ( SELECT f2 FROM t1 WHERE f0 = 1 AND f1 = t2.f1 ORDER BY f2 DESC LIMIT 3 )

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, 1), =($1, $cor0.f1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, 1), =($1, $cor0.f1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

TestCase.name: testMultipleGroupingsWithConstantNotSupported2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, f2 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT f0, f1 FROM t1) t2, LATERAL ( SELECT f2 FROM t1 WHERE 1 = t2.f0 AND f1 = t2.f1 ORDER BY f2 DESC LIMIT 3 )

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 1}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=(1, $cor0.f0), =($1, $cor0.f1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])

LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f2=[$2]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 1}]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}]) : +- LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[3]) +- LogicalProject(f2=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=(1, $cor0.f0), =($1, $cor0.f1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1]])
